scripts.minify:js: for file in public/js/*.js; do [ "${file%.min.js}" = "$file" ] && terser "$file" -c -m -o "${file%.js}.min.js"; done
scripts.minify:css: for file in public/css/*.css; do [ "${file%.min.css}" = "$file" ] && cleancss -o "${file%.css}.min.css" "$file"; done
scripts.minify:all: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css
